  • public class PoisonIvy
extends Plant
    Poison Ivy plant. Reproduces just by surviving, unlike the cherry plant.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      Calls superclass act() and reproduces at the start of each day.
      void deathCheck()
      Checks if this instance of Poison Ivy is eaten and subtracts one from the overall number of Poison Ivy in the world.
      static int getNumPoisonIvy()
      Returns the number of Poison Ivy in the world.
      void reproduce()
      This method allows the Poison Ivy to reproduce every day cycle until it caps at around 30 and stops it from spawning on the number display at the top.

      Sets the number of Poison Ivy in the world.
